title: How Anti-Bribery Laws In Europe Are Bringing U.S. Investors To Africa
teaser: The U.S.-Africa Leaders Summit has brought together scores of African leaders and American businessmen. Billions of dollars of investments have been announced this week. While Africa is becoming attractive to investors, some countries are drawing more attention than others.
